name: Phadaybaz
description:
Phadaybaz is a multiplayer third person shooter. Pappu, Chotay and Pola are three desi kids which are best known for doing Phaday (fights) in their Muhala (neighborhood). They are quite The Phadaybaz. 

Ranked Mode

In Ranked Mode hit the maximum targets and score the highest score you can to climb up the leaderboard.

Phada Mode 

Grab your gulail (sling shot) and do phada (fight) with your friend in 1v1 multiplayer mode be the best Phadaybaz in your desi neighborhood.

CONTROLS

  •  WASD (move) 
  •  Mouse (look)
  •  Right Click or E (aim)
  • Space (jump)
  • Shift (sprint)
  • Left Click or F Press (load)
  •  Left Click or F Release (Shoot)
  • P (pause)
